title: Crisis (CRE218)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the eighteenth episode of our second season, Jesse Thorn, Kevin Allison, and Hallie Haglund share stories of times the fecal matter collided with the blower of air.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jesse Thorn, Kevin Allison, Hallie Haglund, Brett Dennen, Rock-a-Bye-Baby, Jeff Barr, David Crabb, Pogo, Max Essa, Mr. Weebl, Birth Control)
